00032 int CreateDetectorPulse::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00033   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00034   typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00035   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00036 
00037   // Loop through and find a fast channel
00038   for (std::map<std::string, std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> >::iterator findFastIter = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin(); findFastIter != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); findFastIter++) {
00039 
00040     std::string fast_det_name = findFastIter->first;
00041     if (! TSetupData::IsFast(fast_det_name)) continue;
00042       std::string detname = fast_det_name.substr(0, fast_det_name.size() - 2);
00043       std::string slow_det_name = detname + "-S"; // take off the F and add an S
00044 
00045       std::map<std::string, std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> >::iterator findSlowIter= gAnalysedPulseMap.find(slow_det_name);
00046       if(findSlowIter== gAnalysedPulseMap.end()) std::cout<<"Unable to find slow channel, "<<slow_det_name<<std::endl;
00047 
00048           std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> fast_pulses = findFastIter->second;
00049           std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> slow_pulses = findSlowIter->second;
00050 
00051           std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator fastPulseIter = fast_pulses.begin();
00052           std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator slowPulseIter = slow_pulses.begin();
00053           std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator finalFastPulseIter = fast_pulses.end();
00054           std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator finalSlowPulseIter = slow_pulses.end();
00055 
00056           std::vector<std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator> pulseIters;
00057           pulseIters.push_back(fastPulseIter);
00058           pulseIters.push_back(slowPulseIter);
00059 
00060           std::vector<std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator> finalIters;
00061           finalIters.push_back(finalFastPulseIter);
00062           finalIters.push_back(finalSlowPulseIter);
00063 
00064           std::vector<TDetectorPulse*> detectorPulses;
00065 
00066           // Loop through both TAnalysedPulse vectors until they are both finished
00067           // NB with this alogirthm this can be extended to more than 2
00068           double min_time = 999999; // something large
00069           double pulse_time;
00070           while (pulseIters.size() > 0) {
00071 
00072             // Find out which of the next fast or slow pulsees happened next
00073             for (int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b) {
00074               pulse_time = (*pulseIters[b])->GetTime() * 1e-6; // convert to ms       
00075               min_time = std::min(min_time, pulse_time);
00076 
00077             }
00078 
00079             // Now go through and find all the pulses that are within a certain time of this
00080             double time_difference = 0.1; // 0.1 ms
00081             TAnalysedPulse* fast_pulse = NULL;
00082             TAnalysedPulse* slow_pulse = NULL;
00083             for (int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b) {
00084 
00085               TAnalysedPulse* pulse = *(pulseIters[b]);
00086               double pulse_time = pulse->GetTime() * 1e-6; // convert to ms
00087 
00088               if (std::fabs(pulse_time - min_time) < time_difference) {
00089                 if ( TSetupData::IsFast(pulse->GetDetName())) {
00090                   PrintOut("Fast? " << pulse->GetDetName() << std::endl);
00091                   fast_pulse = pulse;
00092                 }
00093                 else if ( TSetupData::IsSlow(pulse->GetDetName()))  {
00094                   PrintOut( "Slow? " << pulse->GetDetName() << std::endl);
00095                   slow_pulse = pulse;
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 ++(pulseIters[b]); // increment the iterator because we used the pulse
00099               }
00100             }
00101             TDetectorPulse* det_pulse = new TDetectorPulse(fast_pulse, slow_pulse, detname); // Create the TDetectorPulse
00102             detectorPulses.push_back(det_pulse);
00103             PrintOut("Created a TDetectorPulse with:\n");
00104             PrintOut("Fast Pulse: " << det_pulse->GetFastPulseTime() * 1e-6 << std::endl);
00105             PrintOut( "Slow Pulse: " << det_pulse->GetSlowPulseTime() * 1e-6 << std::endl);
00106             PrintOut( std::endl);
00107 
00108             //Delete the iterators to finished banks. Go through in reverse to
00109             //avoid invalidation problems
00110             for (int b = pulseIters.size()-1; b >= 0; --b) {
00111               if (pulseIters[b] == finalIters[b]){
00112                 pulseIters.erase(pulseIters.begin() + b);
00113                 finalIters.erase(finalIters.begin() + b);
00114               }  
00115             } // for (int b -reversed)        
00116           } // end for
00117           
00118           gDetectorPulseMap[detname] = detectorPulses;
00119       //} // end loop to find corresponding slow channel
00120   } // end loop to find fast channel
00121   return 0;
00122 }
